Name: Danny
Description: Friendly but knows everyone's price. Won't talk to nobodies.

Name: Thorne
Description: Strict and scarred. Respects a uniform or an expensive suit.

Name: Faceless
Description: Only deals with known criminals. Never shows his face.

Name: Lady V
Description: Ignores anyone not dressed in peak high fashion.

Name: Rat
Description: A source of gutter rumors who will talk to anyone for a coin.

Name: Doctor Elara
Description: Ex-military surgeon with a shaky hand but a brilliant mind.

Name: Kaelen the Smith
Description: Giant of a man. Values physical strength more than reputation.

Name: Mina the Urchin
Description: A child of the shadows who hears things guards want hidden.

Name: Father Malachi
Description: Claims the Void whispers to him. Only trusts the "hardened".

Name: Silas the Scrapper
Description: A genius at fixing junk. Hates the Law; loves high-tech components.

Name: Old Mother Ivy
Description: Lives in a swamp hut. Knows which mushrooms kill and which cure.

Name: The Inquisitor
Description: A shadow figure extracting "truth" for the highest bidder.
